name: Remnant Glow of Scorching Might
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  To weave together myriad thoughts and reign over countless souls — this is theessence of power.  However, power is not cold-blooded tyranny. Its true ideal, at its heart, isto create a utopia free of worry, schemes, and slavery.  It was just as the silent lord saw in the crystal's secrets, and just as thelost companion had once taught.  The dark insect insignia and the steel judgment thus laid the foundations ofthe kingdom's rules.
